message:
Hello all,
any one used before Google Maps API V3 in offline mode ?
i need to download the map tiles and use it on Intranet on my own server
any help ? cause i have found a lot of spam applications for downloading GMaps tiles 

PS: i need the map for Cairo only with a zoom level 18-21

data.message:
You can't use the Google Maps Javascript API v3 offline (the tiles and 
javascript are only legally available online). 

You can't legally use the Google Maps Javascript API v3 on a local 
intranet without an Enterprise (Premier) license 

See the terms of use. 
https://developers.google.com/maps/faq#tos
yes i have just read that, it cost 10K$. unfortunately
do you know if there is any other way to get a basic map with just some markers offline ?
